description: My primary responsibility would be to design, develop, and maintain software applications that run on the front-end. This includes working with various programming languages, frameworks, and tools to build robust and scalable applications.

My role would involve working on the back-end development of web applications using the Express and Django. You would be responsible for building user interfaces, implementing interactive features, and ensuring the performance and responsiveness of the application.

overview: Senior Front-end Developer with 7 years of proven leadership and meaningfully contributions to teams of varying size and scope. I have a strong foundation in web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js, Angular. I am skilled in developing responsive and user-friendly interfaces. With a keen eye for design and attention to detail, I am able to produce high-quality code that meets project requirements and exceeds user expectations.
-Other: Figma, XD, Wix, WordPress, Shopify, WooCommerce, SEO, Git
